# Mini-Assignment 1 (Due 9/16/2022)

* Choose two categories of businesses. See the Yelp API documentation if you need help with the choice.

* Choose a city within the U.S. Select a city that's not too small (e.g., a city that's above 100th rank in this [list](https://worldpopulationreview.com/us-cities))

* Download Yelp data.
Create an interactive map
Provide a simple summary (e.g., how many, where they are located, any spatial patterns)
Discuss what they wish they could do to get more intuition from the data, based on future materials in the syllabus
Put together a short RMarkdown hosted on Rpubs
Submit the link
